title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.15 - Authorization to execute contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.15 - Authorization to execute contracts

State Regulations
(a) The following persons only are authorized
to execute contracts on behalf of the State Education Department: (1)

Commissioner of Education; (2)

Counsel and Deputy Commissioner for Legal

Affairs; (3)

Deputy Counsel; and
(4)

Assistant

Counsel. (b) A contract
for the purpose of this section shall include a contract, a memorandum of
understanding, or any other written promise to pay money or incur financial
obligation except documents prepared by the Department of Audit and Control and
submitted to that department to execute standardized administrative processing
of State agency purchasing, payroll and related services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
3.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
